works.description:
The entire site is for enabling people to
 
download materials illegally.  Many of us publishers have been issuing
take  
down notices.  Now the owner of the site is posting his code so other  
people can recreate his illegal software as he knows.  Please close this  
site asap!  See the latest threads - this site is for the expressed
purpose  
of encouraging illegal activity and ther expense of hard working authors, 

publishers, and booksellers.  It is wrong.  Please do this asap.
